Title: Authorizes the commissioner of corrections and community supervision to discipline certain employees for acts of serious misconduct
Summary: Authorizes the commissioner of corrections and community supervision to discipline certain employees for acts of serious misconduct; defines serious misconduct; establishes procedures for such disciplinary action; prohibits employees who have been removed for serious misconduct from being placed on the eligible list after such removal.
LawCode: Add §12, amd §112, Cor L; amd §§50 & 61, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law and the civil service law, in relation to discipline of certain persons for serious misconduct
